Privacy policy

Privacy Policy

Last Updated: Oct 3rd 2023

At Runam and Runup technologies limited, we are committed to safeguarding your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you access our digital social media services, events ticketing, and bills payment platforms. By using our services, you consent to the practices described in this policy.

1. Information We Collect,

We use your personal information for the following purposes:

- To provide and improve our services, including digital social media services, event ticketing, and bills payment.

- To process transactions and fulfill orders.

- To communicate with you about our services, promotions, and updates.

- To customize your experience and display relevant content.

- To comply with legal requirements and resolve disputes.

3. Data Sharing

We do not share your personal information with third parties for any purposes mentioned above, including payment processors, event organizers, and service providers. We will not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to others.

4. Security

We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access or disclosure.

5. Cookies and Tracking

We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience and gather information about how you use our platforms.

6. Your Choices

You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also opt-out of marketing communications at any time.

7. Changes to this Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices or for legal and regulatory reasons. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

8. Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or the handling of your personal information, please contact us at info@runamapp.com.

By using our services, you agree to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy. Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to maintaining the confidentiality and security of your personal information.

Download Runam app

Runam

Runam is a bills payment app that provides a seamless and secure platform for managing your financial transactions. The app revolutionizes the way users handle payments, offering a convenient solution for paying bills, purchasing data, and performing other essential transactions. With a user-focused approach, Runam ensures a reliable and efficient experience, empowering individuals to stay in control of their finances while enjoying a hassle-free journey.
